Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a single message within the platform.

senderId.description: Reference to User who sent the message. (Relationship: User 1:N Message)

forumId.description: Reference to Forum where the message was posted. (Relationship: Forum 1:N Message)

content.description: The text content of the message.

timestamp.description: The date and time when the message was sent.

Forum.title: Forum
Forum.description: Represents a forum associated with an event.

eventId.description: Reference to Event that the forum is associated with. (Relationship: Event 1:1 Forum)

interests.description: A list of the user's interests.

savedEvents.description: A list of event IDs that the user has saved.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique ID of the user.

definition.description: Represents a forum associated with an event. Includes denormalized event access control information for authorization independence.

params.name: eventId
params.description: The ID of the event this forum belongs to.

params.name: forumId
params.description: The unique ID of the forum.

definition.description: Represents a message within a forum. Includes denormalized forum access control information for authorization independence.

params.name: eventId
params.description: The ID of the event this forum belongs to.

params.name: forumId
params.description: The ID of the forum this message belongs to.

params.name: messageId
params.description: The unique ID of the message.
